title: Executive Assistant to the CEO (Remote - PH-Based)
job_overview:
About the Company:
 Leaders Marketing LLC is a fast-growing digital marketing agency based in the U.S., serving personal injury law firms across the country. We’re looking for a highly dependable and responsive Executive Assistant to directly support our CEO. This is a critical role that requires strong communication, attention to detail, and the ability to stay highly organized in a fast-paced virtual environment.

What You’ll Do:
Serve as the CEO’s right hand—staying closely in touch and always responsive during your shift 9-5 CST
Manage and confirm all CEO-related meetings and appointments
Prepare and send out meeting agendas and take detailed meeting notes
Handle personal executive tasks such as travel booking and basic research
Draft, format, or organize company documents when needed
Track deadlines and follow-ups to ensure the CEO stays on schedule
Organize digital files and ensure everything is properly stored and labeled
Respond to CEO-related emails and messages in a timely and professional manner
Perform other general administrative duties as assigned

Required Qualifications:
Excellent written and verbal English skills with a neutral or minimal accent
At least 2 years of experience supporting executives or working as a virtual assistant
Proficient in tools like Google Workspace, Zoom, Slack, Asana, and other productivity apps
Highly organized and detail-oriented
Able to work U.S. hours and be consistently available during shift hours
Trustworthy, discreet, and able to handle confidential information professionally
Can work independently and take initiative without waiting to be told what to do


Nice to Have:
Experience working with CEOs or high-level managers in a virtual setup
Familiarity with digital marketing agencies or professional services firms
Strong time management and multitasking skill

To Apply:
 Please send the following:
Your updated resume
A short cover letter explaining why you're the perfect fit

A 1-minute voice recording introducing yourself and explaining your most relevant experience (upload via Vocaroo or any link-based voice recorder)

We are looking to fill this role ASAP, so early applicants will be prioritized.
